nodes.text: Bemere was a female Human who served as a commander in the Republic Military during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. She was one of the commanders during the Korriban Incursion, and was slain by Imperial forces.

Commander Bemere appears as one of the four Republic commanders that must be killed in the Imperial version of the Tactical Flashpoint "Assault on Tython," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.7: Invasion. For Republic players, Bemere is replaced by Commander Rethana, and the two share many of their game mechanics.
